Proposed Civil Penalty 

Under 49 U.S.C. § 60122 and 49 CFR § 190.223, you are subject to a civil penalty not to exceed 
$257,664 per violation per day the violation persists, up to a maximum of $2,576,627 for a related 
series of violations.

For violation occurring on or after March 21, 2022 and before January 6,

1 Section 192.631(h) requires that an operator's controller training program must provide for training each controller 
to carry out the roles and responsibilities defined by the operator.

2 Section 192.631(f)(2) requires that field personnel contact the control room when emergency conditions exist and 
when making field changes that affect control room operations.
